Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox are closing in on the post-1900 record for losses
Others: Cleveland's bullpen was terrific once again
Ben Lively departed with a bruised right thigh
Jonathan Cannon was charged with three runs and seven hits in 5 1/3 innings
Six Cleveland relievers combined for seven innings of four-hit ball
Eli Morgan, Cade Smith, Tim Herrin, Hunter Gaddis and Erik Sabrowski combined to close it out
Chicago was shut out for the 17th time
The White Sox have dropped a franchise-record 14 straight at home
